article_title: Britain Gets Tougher on Foreign Takeovers
article_text:
LONDON—The U.K. government said it would stiffen laws governing foreign takeovers of British companies, potentially raising new hurdles for overseas acquirers amid heightened interest in British companies as takeover targets.

The new measures—which the government hasn't detailed, but announced in general terms Sunday—come after U.S. drugs company Pfizer Inc. failed to seal a nearly $120 billion deal to buy rival AstraZeneca PLC. The...

article_metadata.article.origheadline: Britain Gets Tougher on Foreign Takeovers

article_summary:
LONDON—The U.K. government said it would stiffen laws governing foreign takeovers of British companies, potentially raising new hurdles for overseas acquirers amid heightened interest in British companies as takeover targets.
The new measures—which the government hasn't detailed, but announced in general terms Sunday—come after U.S. drugs company Pfizer Inc. failed to seal a nearly $120 billion deal to buy rival AstraZeneca PLC.
